hard: Ziri – Ziri is the best defense tank in terms of self-defense. Astrid and Lucas will attack the frontline so having a strong tank is a must.
soft: Aoe damage – Lucas can provide a window to recover health to allied tank because Lucas will be in a front of anyone. Using aoe damage dealers will eliminate this problem and focus down Astrid and other weak enemy heroes.
Armor artifact – Astrid and Lucas are a physical damage dealers. Use armor artifacts to deny damage to them.
